Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Palatable \Pal"a*ta*ble\, a. [From {Palate}.] Agreeable to the palate or taste; savory; hence, acceptable; pleasing; as, palatable food; palatable advice. Opposite of {unpalatable}. [1913 Webster]
palatable adj : acceptable to the taste or mind; "palatable food"; "a palatable solution to the problem" [ant: {unpalatable}]
